name: Save The Customer
description:
Pizza boxes will be scrolling down, but there are some empty boxes and some boxes that comtains a poisonous pizza, so you should eliminate them to save your customers.

Use the magnifying glass to check what is inside of the pizza boxes.

Use your mouse to drag the pizza boxes to the right place.

This game was made for The quarantine game jam.

All game assets are from flaticon.com
